certificates.name: Front-End Web Development
certificates.description: A comprehensive course on building responsive and interactive websites using modern front-end technologies.

certificates.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures
certificates.description: Learned to solve complex programming problems and implement efficient algorithms and data structures in JavaScript.

certificates.name: React - The Complete Guide
certificates.description: Mastered React for building dynamic web applications with functional components, hooks, and routing.

certificates.name: Python for Everybody
certificates.description: Introduced to Python programming and data manipulation techniques, including API interactions and basic data analysis.

certificates.name: AWS Cloud Practitioner
certificates.description: Gained foundational knowledge of cloud computing concepts and AWS core services, including deployment and security.

certificates.name: UX Design Fundamentals
certificates.description: Learned the principles of user experience design, conducting research, creating wireframes, and building prototypes.

certificates.name: SQL for Data Analysis
certificates.description: Focused on querying databases with SQL and performing data analysis to extract meaningful insights.

certificates.name: Git & GitHub Masterclass
certificates.description: Learned version control using Git, managing repositories, collaborating with others, and using GitHub workflows effectively.
